channel.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
channel.description:
Hey this is my 5th model,*Not Finished* its called the Dragon Greatsword and I hope you like it, alot of time was spent creating the texture and the model it self... I'm working on a texture for the handle and a new handle, ideas would be appreciated! Also CC is very greatly appreciated as well. Here are some pics,
Regulars
Front View [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/1355/picture4tz.png[/img] Side View [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/9284/picture3en.png[/img]
Wireframes
Side View [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/8523/picture1us.png[/img] Front View [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/7619/picture2yki.png[/img] There you go! :D

item.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

auroth:

I made a couple designs in paint.net but they didn’t really fit it so I threw them away and I have been really busy today, please explain when you mean to unwrap it, I’m new i don’t understand… Yeah I didn’t really get Mr.Google’s or Reyx’s tut can you help? Yeah I do need to work on the concept but like I said I’ve been busy thanks btw

You have to map your object first and unwrap it to apply textures… :fp:

Read full topic

item.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
item.dc:creator: @FinalDestionation FinalDestionation
item.description:
@FinalDestionation wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

This looks plain and no thought put into it.

Read full topic

item.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
item.dc:creator: @auroth auroth
item.description:
@auroth wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:9, topic:403058”][quote author=auroth link=topic=500118.msg3657900#msg3657900 date=1310155310]
Gah!!! for the second time, “I’m working on a texture for the
handle and a new handle” the blade I think and know looks fine, and The first thing you said was fine, but your completely wrong on the second thing you said It had thought put into it, for it to be a dragon Greatsword…
[/quote]
Can I see the texture you are working on? And the model unwrapped, want to make sure you did it correctly.

@model You made the blade wrong. When you make an edge on a sword, it goes all the way around and then comes to a point. It isn’t a shank.

Also put some more thought into your concept. Right now you literally have 2 unedited primitives in there.[/quote]
I made a couple designs in paint.net but they didn’t really fit it so I threw them away and I have been really busy today, please explain when you mean to unwrap it, I’m new i don’t understand… Yeah I didn’t really get Mr.Google’s or Reyx’s tut can you help? Yeah I do need to work on the concept but like I said I’ve been busy thanks btw

M'am.
Im pretty sure its spelled mam or M'am I dunno thanks anyway

Read full topic

item.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“auroth, post:7, topic:403058”]Gah!!! for the second time, “I’m working on a texture for the
handle and a new handle” the blade I think and know looks fine, and The first thing you said was fine, but your completely wrong on the second thing you said It had thought put into it, for it to be a dragon Greatsword…[/quote]
Can I see the texture you are working on? And the model unwrapped, want to make sure you did it correctly.

@model You made the blade wrong. When you make an edge on a sword, it goes all the way around and then comes to a point. It isn’t a shank.

Also put some more thought into your concept. Right now you literally have 2 unedited primitives in there.

Read full topic

item.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

auroth:

Btw what did I mispell?

M’am.

Read full topic

item.title: ***5th Model*** Dragon Greatsword *Not Finished*
item.dc:creator: @auroth auroth
item.description:
@auroth wrote:

[quote=“disturbing, post:5, topic:403058”][quote author=auroth link=topic=500118.msg3657821#msg3657821 date=1310151687]

This looks plain and no thought put into it.

Alright I know it looks plain, “I’m working on a texture for the
handle and a new handle” How does it look like it had no
thaught put into it, you sir should not talk
about something you have no idea of what it is,
oh wait I didnt mean to insult you mam…
[/quote]
Are you serious? It’s called constructive criticism and you’re getting pissed?
I can tell and I’m not a model designer that it looks very plain and that it definetly has no thought put to it, looks just like an ordinary sword coloured red and black[/quote]
Gah!!! for the second time, “I’m working on a texture for the
handle and a new handle” the blade I think and know looks fine, and The first thing you said was fine, but your completely wrong on the second thing you said It had thought put into it, for it to be a dragon Greatsword…

Well its nearly flat, the handle is larger than the hilt, the texture is ripped right from the dragon platebody, looks lazily done, and could be made easily probably in under a minute. Put more effort into it. Its your 5th model now, right? You should be able to.

Oh, and by the way, insults aren’t exactly effective when you misspell them…

Yeah i guess it is kinda flat Ill work on that thanks but the texture was not ripped from the dragon plate body, I made it in paint.net, although I was using it as a base I did not copy and paste no. I know It needs more effort its not complete I guess I forgot to mention that Ill post it now. Btw what did I mispell? Thanks for the cc

Read full topic
